mapper.insert: insert into board ( boardNum ,board_tag ,board_nickname ,board_title ,board_content ,board_inputdate ,board_hits ) values ( board_seq.nextval ,#{board_tag} ,#{board_nickname} ,#{board_title} ,#{board_content} ,sysdate ,0 )
mapper.select: select boardNum ,board_tag ,board_title ,board_nickname ,board_content ,to_char(board_inputdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh:mi') board_inputdate ,board_hits from board where boardnum=#{boardnum}

select count(*) from board
where board_nickname like '%' || #{searchText} || '%'
where board_title like '%' || #{searchText} || '%'
where board_content like '%' || #{searchText} || '%'
select * from boardreply where boardnum = #{boardNum} order by reply_inputdate desc
mapper.update: update boardreply set reply_text = #{reply_text}, reply_inputdate = sysdate where replynum = #{replynum}
mapper.select: select count(*) from boardreply_like where replynum = #{0} and blike_nickname = #{1}
mapper.update: update boardreply set reply_like = reply_like+1 where replynum = #{replynum}
